replies.body:
Situational Stunners bundle???
When did fiora have a stun?
if you hit her with  a cc move while she's parrying and the parry hits you, it stuns you.

Hired Guns bundle
Project lucian instead of hired gun lucian :/
I want frozen shen but do I have to buy the bundle? to get it?

Ye dude seeing as its a legacy u cant get em from the store anymore unless they bring all legacy back for a limited time like they have done in the past although if ur lucky u c an get it from a hextech chest
